features: WITH LAVENDER & ALOE VERA: Nourishing Aloe moisturizes baby’s skin while Lavender’s soothing, calming aroma help keep your baby happy during changing and clean-ups.
EXTRA SOFT AND BALANCED FOR BABY: Gently formulated, calming, soothing and protecting, these baby wipes are specially designed to clean your baby’s delicate skin without affecting pH balance.
DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED & MILD FOR BABY: Specially designed to preserve the health of your baby’s delicate and sensitive skin.
FREE FROM COMMON CONCERNS: Free from alcohol, parabens and lanolin and ideal for sensitive skin types.
CRUELTY FREE: We care about our furry friends. That’s why we never test our personal care products on animals.
body.description: Extra-soft and moisturizing, Himalaya Soothing Baby Wipes are specially designed to clean your baby's delicate skin without affecting its pH balance. Formulated with the gentle touch of Lavender, Aloe Vera, and Almond Oil, these comforting baby wipes help soothe and moisturize delicate skin. Let the calming scent of Lavender relax your baby in a soft and gentle wipe, perfect for diaper changes and everyday clean-ups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light, yet durable and great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: They smell like baby fresh shampoo from my childhood - I really like these wipes. sometimes hard to pull just one from packet, but that’s not a big deal. A light, excellent fragrance, durable and a good price. Soft on sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice wipes for anything
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased alot of expensive facial wipes, Huggie wipes and counter wipes these last 3+ years, and I have to say "BUY THESE". These are great smelling, great size and normal thinness as facial wipes and dont tear as somone had said and soft. I will be using more on my face, would use on any baby's bottom or whole body, would be great for cleaning anyone's body or body parts or wiping cleaning a small spill on a table or anywhere. All together...these are great wipes for any kind of use, don't dry out your skin like most, smell fantastic and are at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They are gentle on the skin, a nice size. Just a little hard to get out because they don't over lap so one comes up with the other but they come out without pulling out a wad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The wipes smelled good and very soothing. I would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wipes are good but the packaging is not...very hard to get 1 wipe at a time out....they come out in bunches. I wouldn't order these again. It's a shame because the wipes themselves are nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Himalayan soothing baby Wipes
reviews.reviewText: I love these wipes, non irritating, pleasant scent. The whole family uses them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for price
reviews.reviewText: Purchased to use for my dog. Works great and smells nice. Also have in car for hand wipes. Do use for great grand babies when they visit. Great price and quality as well. Will order again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Rough like sandpaper & THIN
reviews.reviewText: I loved how these wipes smelled! However, they’re so thin and need more moisture. When I wiped my granddaughter, just after urinating, I needed 4-6 wipes( and no , she wasn’t covered in urine, she’d barely peed at all, but I like to wipe her “entire “ bottom EVERY time I change her. I also keep Desitin on her bottom,at all times, to keep her rash free, so I need a wipe that can handle removing Desitin, as well as 💩! Although these leave your baby smelling great, they’re too coarse, too thin, and you have to fight with the package dispenser only to pull out 25 wipes at once! The packaging dispenser sucks!!!!
